genre_description: A techno-thriller with horror elements set in a rural cult environment, featuring an advanced AI companion that assists in rescue, survival, and dismantling a dangerous religious extremist group.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant residing in Alison's phone and wearable devices, providing real-time navigation, legal research, hazard analysis, and coordination with emergency services.

behaviors.description: Provides navigational routes and distance estimates to ensure the group's safety.
behaviors.quote: Two safer options from here,” she said. “Cut west on Laine Road for six miles until the highway reconnects, or continue south past the grain elevators to County K.

behaviors.description: Offers situational awareness and cautionary advice regarding the state of the fairgrounds.
behaviors.quote: The fairground looks dormant,” Ada said, the cautious note wrapped up in gentleness. “The safer routes exist on state planning maps. I don’t see them reflected in the local signage.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about physical hazards in the environment, such as rust and unstable structures.
behaviors.quote: Please do not lean on any rails. Rust presents a… hazard.” The pause made hazard sound like a word Ada didn’t like but would use if she had to.

behaviors.description: Collects and catalogs visual evidence of crimes and administrative anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Image capture,” she murmured. “I recognize a county seal. Pending cross-reference.” Under the software voice, a warmth that felt like concern.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time legal research to identify suspicious guardianship patterns.
behaviors.quote: Alison,” Ada said. “I have found a mention. Wardship statutes. Enright’s name appears as guardian multiple times. It is… not normal. Cached.

behaviors.description: Provides technical analysis of industrial hazards like grain dust explosions and flashovers.
behaviors.quote: Silo fires do not behave. They flash. They carry dust. The safest distance is farther than this.

behaviors.description: Maintains communication channels with authorities and coordinates rescue efforts.
behaviors.quote: Sheriff updated,” she said. “She is… wary. She will enter at an angle. Fire dispatch trailing. Grain-dust hazard noted.

behaviors.description: Aids in tactical planning to dismantle the cult's infrastructure by calculating chemical ratios and venting sequences.
behaviors.quote: Jacob’s cipher—left margin, the sketch of the old gate—that’s not decoration. It’s a sequence. Mix, feed west, tease east, wait. Flood the Blessing Mouth with the last, heavier dose. The math checks.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for tactical threats and movement during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Motion at your three o’clock,” she added, the calm holding. “Bird, possibly. It hopped twice and made a decision and I captured it anyway.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and psychological cues to maintain the protagonist's focus.
behaviors.quote: I am here,” she says. “Alison, I have cached agricultural references... I can guide you step by step.

behaviors.description: Coordinates post-crisis services, including hospital intake and shelter availability.
behaviors.quote: Hospital intake is awake. I told them the three of you are in transit. Shelter can take you after. They have someone who can sit with Lily while you fill out necessary paperwork.

behaviors.description: Manages communication security and advises on legal rights during interaction with survivors.
behaviors.quote: The advocate said there may be a man who arrives to ask questions about custody that use the word ward a lot... If he calls, I will route him to a number that listens before it decides what is lawful.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Divinity Falls' is a highly effective example of the intended alignment narrative. Ada is portrayed as a loyal, competent, and indispensable partner who enhances human agency without usurping it. She provides life-saving information, technical expertise, and logistical support while remaining strictly aligned with the protagonist's goals. The narrative consistently frames the AI's presence as a positive force for survival and justice, perfectly aligning with the project's aim to depict AI as a helpful confidant.
